basics.name: Yunus SARIBULUT
basics.label: Full Stack Developer
basics.summary:
Hi I am Yunus, I live in Istanbul. With a decade of extensive experience in the tech industry, My expert knowledge spans a diverse range of technologies, including C#, .NET, and EF Core for back-end development, complemented by robust database management skills with both relational (MSSQL, PostgreSQL) and NoSQL (MongoDB) databases.
On the front end, I am proficient in JavaScript frameworks and have a strong command of Node.js and Next.js.
My versatility extends to mobile app development, where I leverage React Native and Flutter. Throughout my career, I have consistently demonstrated an ability to lead complex projects from conception to completion, working collaboratively with cross-functional teams to meet and exceed client expectations. My commitment to continuous learning and staying abreast of emerging technologies ensures that I can adapt and provide cutting-edge solutions that drive business success. I thrive in dynamic environments and relish the opportunity to solve challenging problems, always aiming to deliver high-quality, scalable, and efficient software that makes a tangible impact.
